form.name: uncomplicated_measles_malaria_status_unknown
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Fever> Uncomplicated Measles Malaria Status Unknown

field.name: Uncomplicated Measles, Malaria Status Unknown | Take Action
Administer first dose of vitamin A, as given below:
Counsel and give second dose of Vitamin A to caregiver/mother to be administered to child the next day
